name: TOUHOU SKY ARENA -MATSURI-CLIMAX
overview: Based on Japan`s popular game series 'Touhou Project' TOUHOU SKY ARENA a fired-up 3D battle action game. The characters abilities change to the playing song within the 'Fired-up battle system'! Enjoy dramatic girl battles in the sky! There are 20 characters with each 2 types for the battles. Choose out of all 40 types! With PlayStation®Network you can play online with up to 4 different players. Over 70 battle songs were recorded by famous Japanese artists like Rokugen Alice, A-ONE, BUTAOTOME and Yuuhei Satellite. The songs echo through the sky of Gensokyo, so let the girls feast begin! Notation in the game is English. Also, all sound is in Japanese.
